name: Alexei A. Efros, Professor EECS Department UC Berkeley
research: The central goal of my research is to use vast amounts of unlabelled visual data to understand, model, and recreate the visual world around us. My research has been mainly in data-driven computer vision, as well as its projection onto computer graphics and computational photography. In the last five years, my lab has been at the forefront of reviving self-supervised learning.
prospective_students: Approach with interest in data-driven computer vision, self-supervised learning, and their applications in various fields.
